reviewText:
I saw this first when I was a kid and I really loved it! That little theme song stayed in my head ever since...
To me there is something wildly compelling about a group of very independent children going out in the world by themselves, totally non-dramatic and matter of fact, living through all kinds of adventures and facing creepy conspiracies...
The other thing I really liked was the fact that there is pretty much no dialogue in the whole movie, it really adds a lot of depth to the characters.
